name: KenFarmer
description:
A chill idle farmer made this Kenney.nl assets. Project is 100% web based, written in HTML/CSS/JS.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Mobile:

*  pinch fingers together to zoom

* drag to rotate camera

* tap to select a tile 

* tap with a tile selected to plant seeds or to harvest finished crops for $$

Desktop:

* Same as above but use the mouse to drag, scroll wheel to zoom, and click instead of tap
